а)312,16(10) = ?(16)
312/16 = 19 312 - 19 * 16 = 312-304=8
19/16 = 1 19 - 16*1 = 3
1 / 16 = 0 1 - 16*0 = 1
138
0,16 * 16 = 2,56 i = 2
0,56*16=8,96 8
0,96 * 16 = 15,36 F
0,36 * 16 = 5,76 5
0,76 * 16 = 12,16 C
0,16 * 16 = 2,56 2
0x138,28F5C2

б) 256,66
256/16 = 16 а=0
16/16=1 а=0
1/16 = 0 а = 1
0,66 *16 = 10,56 А
0,56 * 16 = 8,96 8
0,96 * 16 = 15,36 F
0,36 * 16 = 5,76 5
0,76 * 16 = 12,16 C
0,16*16 = 2,56 2
0x100,A8F5C2

в) 123,456
123/16 = 7 123-7*16 = 123 - 112 = 11 B
7/16 = 0 a = 7
7B
0,456 * 16 = 7,296 7
0,296 * 16 = 4,736 4
0,736 * 16 = 11,776 B
0,776 * 16 = 12,416 C
0,416 * 16 = 6,656 6
0,656 * 16 = 10,496 A
0x7B,74BC6A

г) 317,03125
317/16 = 19 317 - 19 * 16 = 317-304 = 13 D
19/16 = 1 19 - 16*1 = 3
1/16 = 0 a = 1
13D
0,03125 * 16 = 0,5 0
0,5 * 16 = 8,0 8
Ox13D,08
